qas.question: A contract with what television network led to the discontinuation of exhibition games in the preseason?
How many games was the regular season in 1996?
How many games were played in the 2001 regular season?
How many games long was the 2011 regular season?
How many games will each team play in the 2016 regular season?

context: The practice of playing one or two preseason exhibition games by each team before the start of the regular season was discontinued when the <a0_0>NBC<a0_0/> contract was initiated, and the regular season was extended from <a1_0>14<a1_0/> games, the length that it had been since 1996, to <a2_0><a4_0>16<a4_0/><a2_0/> from 2001 to 2010, and since 2016. From 2011 to 2015, the regular season league expanded to <a3_0>18<a3_0/> games, with each team having two bye weeks and the option of two preseason games.
